title: Literacy rate in South Africa 2015
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting Adult total, Adult male, and Adult female. The y axis indicates the Share of population ages 15 and above and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Adult total, and Adult female are gradually increasing, Adult male is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Share of population ages 15 and above in descending order is: 1. Adult male, 2. Adult total, and lastly, 3. Adult female.
Throughout the period, Adult male generally had the highest Share of population ages 15 and above relative to others with an average of 94.13, and it reached its maximum at 2015 with a value of 95.4.
After Adult male, Adult total overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 92.8, peaking at 2015.
Adult female mostly had the least Share of population ages 15 and above with a mean value of 91.66, which peaked at 2015 with a value of 93.41.
yAxis: Share of population ages 15 and above
